movie_results.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movie_results.original_title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
movie_results.overview: While the Civil War rages on between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hitman, and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.
